https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9HRQiPxTGsUpP9hqCC1R5D1gQZT.jpg On Halloween night in New Salem, Radio DJs Chilly Billy and Paul tell a twisted anthology of terrifying local myths. Residents of the small-town experience horrifying paranormal encounters that lead them to a grim end. Bad Candy
